## Description {#details}

<Link id="details" />



This experimental backend is for the 8-bit Atmel <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Atmel_AVR">AVR</a> microcontroller.



<Link id="details" />




<ul>
<li><a href="https://llvm.org/bugs/buglist.cgi?product=libraries&component=Backend%3A%20AVR&resolution=---&list_id=109466">Unresolved bugs</a></li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/avr-llvm/architecture">Architecture notes</a></li>
</ul>

</DoxygenPage>
